import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css' import { Button, Container, Table } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import { Link, useRouteMatch, useHistory } from 'react-router-dom' import axios from "axios" const HRCourses = () => { const { url } = useRouteMatch() const [courses, setCourses] = useState([]) let history = useHistory() useEffect(() => { axios.get("http://127.0.0.1:5000/courses") .then(res => { setCourses(res.data) }) }, []) const publishCourse = (id) => { axios.post("http://127.0.0.1:5000/courses/publishCourse", { "courseID": id }) alert("Course has been published!") window.location.reload() } return(

Courses

ID Name Class Size Trainer Enrolment Start Enrolment End Start date End date Materials Uploaded? Edit Publish Course
{course.courseID} {course.courseName} {course.class} {course.size} {course.trainer} {course.enrolmentStart} {course.enrolmentEnd} {course.startDate} {course.endDate} {course.materialStatus === 0 ? "No" : "Yes"} {' '} {course.isPublished === 0 ? : "Course is published!"}
) } export default HRCourses
